OP11-001.name: Koby OP11-001
OP11-001.effect: Your {SWORD} type Characters can attack Characters on the turn in which they are played. [Once Per Turn] If your {Navy} type Character with 7000 base power or less would be removed from the field by your opponent's effect, you may place 3 cards from your trash at the bottom of your deck in any order instead.

OP11-002.name: Ain OP11-002
OP11-002.effect: [On Play] Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −1000 power during this turn. Then, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 0 power or less.

OP11-004.name: Kujyaku OP11-004
OP11-004.effect: [On Play] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Navy} type card other than [Kujyaku] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order. [Activate: Main] You may trash this Character: Up to 1 of your Characters gains +1000 power during this turn.

OP11-005.name: Smoker OP11-005
OP11-005.effect: [Blocker] [DON!! x1] This Character cannot be K.O.'d by effects of Characters without the <Special> attribute.

OP11-006.name: Zephyr OP11-006
OP11-006.effect: [DON!! x1] [When Attacking] Give up to 1 of your opponent's <Special> attribute Characters −5000 power during this turn.

OP11-007.name: Tashigi OP11-007
OP11-007.effect: [Activate: Main] You may rest this Character: If your Leader has the {Navy} type, up to 1 of your {Navy} type Characters gains +2000 power during this turn.

OP11-008.name: Doll OP11-008
OP11-008.effect: [Blocker] [On Play] You may trash 1 card from your hand: If your Leader has the {Navy} type, give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −6000 power during this turn.

OP11-009.name: Nico Robin OP11-009
OP11-009.effect: [DON!! x2] [When Attacking] Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −2000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.

OP11-010.name: Hibari OP11-010
OP11-010.effect: [On Play] Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −2000 power during this turn. [When Attacking] This Character gains +1000 power during this turn. Then, up to 1 of your {Navy} type Leader can also attack active Characters during this turn.

OP11-012.name: Franky OP11-012
OP11-012.effect: [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When your opponent activates an Event, all of your Characters gain +2000 power during this turn.

OP11-013.name: Prince Grus OP11-013
OP11-013.effect: [When Attacking] All of your opponent's Characters with 2000 power or less cannot activate [Blocker] during this turn.

OP11-014.name: Borsalino OP11-014
OP11-014.effect: [Blocker] [Activate: Main] You may rest this Character: Up to 1 of your {Navy} type Leader or Character cards can also attack active Characters during this turn.

OP11-016.name: Roronoa Zoro OP11-016
OP11-016.effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] Give up to 1 rested DON!! card to your Leader or 1 of your Characters.

OP11-018.name: Honesty Impact OP11-018
OP11-018.effect: [Main] Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −4000 power during this turn. Then, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 6000 power or less. [Trigger] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 6000 power or less.

OP11-019.name: Glorp Web!! OP11-019
OP11-019.effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this battle. Then, if your opponent has a Character with 6000 power or more, up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +1000 power during this turn. [Trigger] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +1000 power during this turn.

OP11-020.name: X Calibur OP11-020
OP11-020.effect: [Main] Give up to 2 of your opponent's Characters −2000 power during this turn. Then, up to 1 of your {Navy} type Characters gains +1000 power during this turn. [Trigger] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 4000 power or less.

OP11-021.name: Jinbe OP11-021
OP11-021.effect: [End of Your Turn] If you have 6 or less cards in your hand, set up to 1 of your {Fish-Man} or {Merfolk} type Characters and up to 1 of your DON!! cards as active.

OP11-022.name: Shirahoshi OP11-022
OP11-022.effect: This Leader cannot attack. [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may rest 1 of your DON!! cards and turn 1 card from the top of your Life cards face-up: Play up to 1 {Neptunian} type Character card or [Megalo] with a cost equal to or less than the number of DON!! cards on your field from your hand.

OP11-023.name: Arlong OP11-023
OP11-023.effect: If your Leader has the {Fish-Man} type, you have 3 or less Life cards and your opponent has 5 or more rested cards, give this card in your hand −3 cost. [Trigger] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less.

OP11-024.name: Aladine OP11-024
OP11-024.effect: When this Character is K.O.'d by your opponent's effect, you may trash 1 card from your hand and rest 1 of your DON!! cards. If you do, play up to 1 {Fish-Man} or {Merfolk} type Character card with a cost of 6 or less from your hand.

OP11-025.name: Ishilly OP11-025
OP11-025.effect: [On Your Opponent's Attack] [Once Per Turn] You may rest 1 of your DON!! cards and this Character: Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +1000 power during this battle.

OP11-027.name: Bulge-Eyed Neptunian OP11-027
OP11-027.effect: If your Leader is [Shirahoshi], this Character can attack Characters on the turn in which it is played.

OP11-028.name: Lord of the Coast OP11-028
OP11-028.effect: [On Play] Up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters will not become active in your opponent's next Refresh Phase. [Trigger] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 3 or less.

OP11-029.name: Charlotte Praline OP11-029
OP11-029.effect: [Blocker] [On Play] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 1 or less.

OP11-030.name: Shirahoshi OP11-030
OP11-030.effect: [Activate: Main] You may rest 1 of your DON!! cards and this Character: Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Neptunian} or {Fish-Man Island} type card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

OP11-031.name: Jinbe OP11-031
OP11-031.effect: [On Play] If your Leader has the {Fish-Man} or {Merfolk} type, rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less. [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] Up to 1 of your {Fish-Man} or {Merfolk} type Characters can attack Characters on the turn in which it is played.

OP11-034.name: Hatchan OP11-034
OP11-034.effect: [Activate: Main] You may rest this Character: If your Leader has the {Fish-Man} or {Merfolk} type, up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less cannot be rested until the end of your opponent's next turn.

OP11-035.name: Fisher Tiger OP11-035
OP11-035.effect: [On Play] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters. When this Character is K.O.'d by your opponent's effect, you may rest 1 of your DON!! cards. If you do, play up to 1 {Fish-Man} or {Merfolk} type Character card with a cost of 4 or less from your hand.

OP11-036.name: Spotted Neptunian OP11-036
OP11-036.effect: [On Play] If your Leader is [Shirahoshi], look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Neptunian} type card or [Shirahoshi] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

OP11-037.name: Ancient Weapon Poseidon OP11-037
OP11-037.effect: [Main] Look at 4 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Neptunian} or {Fish-Man Island} type Character card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order. [Trigger] Draw 1 card.

OP11-038.name: Gum-Gum Elephant Gatling OP11-038
OP11-038.effect: [Main] You may rest 1 of your DON!! cards: Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less. [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader gains +3000 power during this battle.

OP11-039.name: Vagabond Drill OP11-039
OP11-039.effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your {Fish-Man} or {Merfolk} type Leader or Character cards gains +3000 power during this battle. Then, rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less. [Trigger] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less.

OP11-040.name: Monkey D. Luffy OP11-040
OP11-040.effect: This effect can be activated at the start of your turn. If you have 8 or more DON!! cards on your field, look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Straw Hat Crew} type card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the top or bottom of the deck in any order.

OP11-041.name: Nami OP11-041
OP11-041.effect: [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] This effect can be activated when a card is removed from your or your opponent's Life cards. If you have 7 or less cards in your hand, draw 1 card. [DON!! x1] [On Your Opponent's Attack] [Once Per Turn] You may trash 1 card from your hand: This Leader gains +2000 power during this turn.

OP11-042.name: Vito OP11-042
OP11-042.effect: [On Play] You may trash 1 {Firetank Pirates} type card from your hand: This Character gains [Rush] during this turn.

OP11-043.name: Vinsmoke Ichiji OP11-043
OP11-043.effect: [Blocker] [On Your Opponent's Attack] [Once Per Turn] This effect can be activated when you only have Characters with a type including "GERMA". Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +1000 power during this battle. Then, trash 2 cards from the top of your deck.

OP11-044.name: Vinsmoke Judge OP11-044
OP11-044.effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may trash 1 card from your hand: All of your {GERMA 66} type Characters gain +1000 power during this turn.

OP11-046.name: Vinsmoke Yonji OP11-046
OP11-046.effect: [Blocker] If you only have Characters with a type including "GERMA", this Character cannot be K.O.'d or rested by your opponent's effects.

OP11-047.name: Vinsmoke Reiju OP11-047
OP11-047.effect: [On Play] If your Leader has the {The Vinsmoke Family} type, look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 card with a type including "GERMA" and add it to your hand. Then, trash the rest.

OP11-048.name: Capone "Gang" Bege OP11-048
OP11-048.effect: [On Play] Look at 4 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Firetank Pirates} or {Straw Hat Crew} type card with a cost of 2 or more and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

OP11-049.name: Carrot OP11-049
OP11-049.effect: [On Play] Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck and place them at the top or bottom of the deck in any order. [On Your Opponent's Attack] You may trash this Character: Up to 1 of your Leader gains +1000 power during this battle.

OP11-050.name: Gotti OP11-050
OP11-050.effect: [When Attacking] You may trash 1 {Firetank Pirates} type card from your hand: Return up to 1 Character with a cost of 1 or less to the owner's hand or place it at the bottom of their deck.

OP11-051.name: Sanji OP11-051
OP11-051.effect: [On Play] Return up to 1 Character with 5000 base power or less to the owner's hand. When this Character is K.O.'d by your opponent's effect, look at 5 cards from the top of your deck and play up to 1 {Straw Hat Crew} type Character card with a cost of 5 or less. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

OP11-054.name: Nami OP11-054
OP11-054.effect: [Blocker] [On Play] If your Leader is multicolored, draw 3 cards and place 2 cards from your hand at the top or bottom of your deck in any order.

OP11-056.name: Brook OP11-056
OP11-056.effect: [Blocker] [On Play] Place up to 1 Character with a base cost of 1 at the bottom of the owner's deck.

OP11-057.name: Pedro OP11-057
OP11-057.effect: If you have 4 or less cards in your hand, this Character gains [Blocker].

OP11-058.name: Monkey D. Luffy OP11-058
OP11-058.effect: If you have 5 or more cards in your hand, this Character cannot attack. [Blocker]

OP11-059.name: Gum-Gum King Cobra OP11-059
OP11-059.effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this battle. Then, if you have 4 or less cards in your hand, that card gains an additional +2000 power during this battle. [Trigger] Return up to 1 Character with a cost of 2 or less to the owner's hand.

OP11-060.name: Let's Crash This Wedding!!! OP11-060
OP11-060.effect: [Main] If your Leader is multicolored, look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Straw Hat Crew} type card other than [Let's Crash This Wedding!!!] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order. [Trigger] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

OP11-061.name: Gum-Gum Jet Culverin OP11-061
OP11-061.effect: [Main] Place up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a base cost of 4 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck. [Trigger] Place up to 1 Character with a cost of 1 or less at the bottom of the owner's deck.

OP11-062.name: Charlotte Katakuri OP11-062
OP11-062.effect: [When Attacking]/[On Your Opponent's Attack] [Once Per Turn] DON!! −1: Look at 1 card from the top of your opponent's deck. Then, this Leader gains +1000 power during this battle.

OP11-063.name: Little Sadi OP11-063
OP11-063.effect: [On Play] DON!! −1: If your Leader has the {Impel Down} type, rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less.

OP11-065.name: Charlotte Anana OP11-065
OP11-065.effect: If you have a purple {Big Mom Pirates} type Character other than [Charlotte Anana], this Character gains [Blocker].

OP11-066.name: Charlotte Oven OP11-066
OP11-066.effect: [Activate: Main] You may rest this Character: Choose a cost and reveal 1 card from the top of your opponent's deck. If the revealed card has the chosen cost, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a base cost of 3 or less. Then, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it.

OP11-067.name: Charlotte Katakuri OP11-067
OP11-067.effect: [Blocker] [End of Your Turn] Set up to 2 of your {Big Mom Pirates} type Characters with a cost of 3 or more as active. Then, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it.

OP11-069.name: Charlotte Brulee OP11-069
OP11-069.effect: [On Play] You may add 1 card from the top of your Life cards to your hand: If your Leader has the {Big Mom Pirates} type, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.

OP11-070.name: Charlotte Pudding OP11-070
OP11-070.effect: [On Play] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Big Mom Pirates} type card with a cost of 2 or more and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order. [Activate: Main] DON!! −1, You may rest this Character: Look at 1 card from the top of your opponent's deck.

OP11-071.name: Charlotte Perospero OP11-071
OP11-071.effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] You may trash 1 card from your hand: Choose a cost and reveal 1 card from the top of your opponent's deck. If the revealed card has the chosen cost, draw 1 card and add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.

OP11-072.name: Charlotte Mont-d'or OP11-072
OP11-072.effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] DON!! −1, You may rest this Character: Your opponent places 2 cards from their trash at the bottom of their deck in any order. Then, add 1 card from the top of your Life cards to your hand.

OP11-073.name: Charlotte Linlin OP11-073
OP11-073.effect: If your Leader has the {Big Mom Pirates} type, this Character gains [Rush]. [On Your Opponent's Attack] [Once Per Turn] DON!! −5: Choose a cost and reveal 1 card from the top of your opponent's deck. If the revealed card has the chosen cost, up to 1 of your Leader gains +2000 power during this turn.

OP11-074.name: Streusen OP11-074
OP11-074.effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] DON!! −1, You may rest this Character: Choose a cost and reveal 1 card from the top of your opponent's deck. If the revealed card has the chosen cost, rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less.

OP11-075.name: Jaguar D. Saul OP11-075
OP11-075.effect: [On Play] If your Leader is [Nico Robin] and you have 7 or more DON!! cards on your field, draw 2 cards. [Trigger] Activate this card's [On Play] effect.

OP11-076.name: Hannyabal OP11-076
OP11-076.effect: [Blocker] [On Play] If your Leader has the {Impel Down} type, play up to 1 {Impel Down} type Character card with a cost of 3 or less from your hand.

OP11-077.name: Randolph OP11-077
OP11-077.effect: [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When a DON!! card on your field is returned to your DON!! deck, up to 1 of your {Big Mom Pirates} type Characters gains +2 cost until the end of your opponent's next turn.

OP11-079.name: When Two Men Are Fighting the Last Thing I Need Is Some Half-Hearted Assistance!!!! OP11-079
OP11-079.effect: [Counter] Choose a cost and reveal 1 card from the top of your opponent's deck. If the revealed card has the chosen cost, up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +5000 power during this battle. [Trigger] Draw 1 card.

OP11-080.name: Gear Two OP11-080
OP11-080.effect: [Main] You may rest 2 of your DON!! cards: If your Leader's colors include blue, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it. [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader gains +3000 power during this battle.

OP11-081.name: Cognac Mama-Mash OP11-081
OP11-081.effect: [Main] Choose a cost and reveal 1 card from the top of your opponent's deck. If the revealed card has the chosen cost, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a base cost of 8 or less. [Trigger] Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.

OP11-082.name: Aramaki OP11-082
OP11-082.effect: [Activate: Main] You may trash this Character: If your Leader has the {Navy} type, up to 1 of your {Navy} type Characters can also attack active Characters during this turn. Then, trash 2 cards from the top of your deck.

OP11-083.name: Caribou OP11-083
OP11-083.effect: [Blocker] [On Play] Trash 2 cards from your hand.

OP11-084.name: Kuzan OP11-084
OP11-084.effect: [On Play] Trash 3 cards from the top of your deck. [When Attacking] Up to 1 of your {Navy} type Leader or Character cards can also attack active Characters during this turn.

OP11-085.name: Kurozumi Orochi OP11-085
OP11-085.effect: [On Play] Add up to 1 {SMILE} type card with a cost of 5 or less from your trash to your hand.

OP11-086.name: Coribou OP11-086
OP11-086.effect: [On Play] Trash 1 card from your hand. [Activate: Main] You may trash this Character: Play up to 1 [Caribou] with a cost of 4 or less from your trash.

OP11-088.name: Shu OP11-088
OP11-088.effect: [Blocker] [Once Per Turn] This effect can be activated when your opponent's Character attacks. If that Character has the <Slash> attribute, this Character gains +5000 power during this battle.

OP11-091.name: Berry Good OP11-091
OP11-091.effect: [On Play] Your opponent places 3 Events from their trash at the bottom of their deck in any order.

OP11-092.name: Helmeppo OP11-092
OP11-092.effect: [On Play] You may trash 1 card from your hand: Draw 1 card and play up to 1 {SWORD} type Character card with a cost of 8 or less other than [Helmeppo] from your trash. Then, place the 1 Character played by this effect at the bottom of the owner's deck at the end of this turn.

OP11-095.name: Monkey D. Garp OP11-095
OP11-095.effect: [On Play] You may place 3 {Navy} type cards from your trash at the bottom of your deck in any order: Give up to 1 rested DON!! card to 1 of your Leader. Then, if there is a Character with a cost of 9 or more, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 7 or less.

OP11-096.name: Ripper OP11-096
OP11-096.effect: If you have a black {Navy} type Character other than [Ripper], this Character gains [Blocker].

OP11-097.name: After All These Years I'm Losing My Edge!!! OP11-097
OP11-097.effect: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +1000 power during this battle. Then, if you have 10 or more cards in your trash, add up to 1 black Character card with a cost of 3 or less from your trash to your hand.

OP11-098.name: Blue Hole OP11-098
OP11-098.effect: [Main] You may trash 3 cards from the top of your deck: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less. [Trigger] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +1000 power during this turn.

OP11-099.name: I'm Gonna Be a Navy Officer!!! OP11-099
OP11-099.effect: [Main] Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Navy} type card other than [I'm Gonna Be a Navy Officer!!!] and add it to your hand. Then, trash the rest. [Trigger] Activate this card's [Main] effect.

OP11-100.name: Otohime OP11-100
OP11-100.effect: [On Play] If your Leader is [Shirahoshi], you may turn 1 card from the top of your Life cards face-down: Draw 1 card.

OP11-101.name: Capone "Gang" Bege OP11-101
OP11-101.effect: [Blocker] [Once Per Turn] If your {Supernovas} type Character other than [Capone "Gang" Bege] would be removed from the field by your opponent's effect, you may add it to the top of your Life cards face-down instead.

OP11-102.name: Camie OP11-102
OP11-102.effect: [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] This effect can be activated when your opponent activates an Event or [Trigger]. If your opponent has 2 or more Life cards, trash 1 card from the top of each of your and your opponent's Life cards.

OP11-103.name: Long-Jaw Neptunian OP11-103
OP11-103.effect: [Activate: Main] If your Leader is [Shirahoshi], you may rest this Character and turn 1 card from the top of your Life cards face-down: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 3 or less.

OP11-104.name: Shirley OP11-104
OP11-104.effect: [Blocker] [On Play] You may turn 1 card from the top of your Life cards face-down: Look at 3 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Fish-Man Island} type card and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the top or bottom of the deck in any order.

OP11-106.name: Zeus OP11-106
OP11-106.effect: [On Play] You may add 1 card from the top or bottom of your Life cards to your hand: K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 5 or less.

OP11-107.name: Topknot Neptunian OP11-107
OP11-107.effect: [Blocker] [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] If your Leader is [Shirahoshi], you may turn 1 card from the top of your Life cards face-down: Set this Character as active at the end of this turn.

OP11-108.name: Neptune OP11-108
OP11-108.effect: [On Play] If your Leader is [Shirahoshi], you may turn 1 card from the top of your Life cards face-down: Draw 2 cards and trash 1 card from your hand.

OP11-109.name: Pappag OP11-109
OP11-109.effect: [On Play] If you have [Camie], draw 2 cards and trash 2 cards from your hand.

OP11-110.name: Fukaboshi OP11-110

OP11-112.name: Megalo OP11-112
OP11-112.effect: [Blocker] [Opponent's Turn] If your Leader is [Shirahoshi], this Character gains +4000 power.

OP11-114.name: Gum-Gum Fire-Fist Pistol Red Hawk OP11-114
OP11-114.effect: [Main] You may rest 3 of your DON!! cards: If you and your opponent have a total of 5 or more Life cards, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a base cost of 5 or less. [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader gains +3000 power during this battle.

OP11-115.name: You're Just Not My Type! OP11-115
OP11-115.effect: [Counter] If your Leader is [Shirahoshi], up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +4000 power during this battle. [Trigger] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less.

OP11-116.name: Merman Combat Ultramarine OP11-116
OP11-116.effect: [Main] Add up to 1 Character with a cost of 6 or less to the top or bottom of the owner's Life cards face-up. [Trigger] Add up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 4 or less to the top or bottom of the owner's Life cards face-up.

OP11-117.name: Fish-Man Island OP11-117
OP11-117.effect: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] If your Leader is [Shirahoshi], you may turn 1 card from the top of your Life cards face-up: Up to 1 of your {Neptunian}, {Fish-Man}, or {Merfolk} type Characters gains +1000 power during this turn.

OP11-118.name: Monkey D. Luffy OP11-118
OP11-118.effect: [Rush] [When Attacking] You may trash 1 card from your hand: Return up to 1 Character with a cost of 4 or less to the owner's hand. Then, give up to 1 rested DON!! card to your Leader or 1 of your Characters.

OP11-119.name: Koby OP11-119
OP11-119.effect: [On Play] Up to 1 of your Characters can also attack active Characters during this turn. [When Attacking] You may place 2 cards from your trash at the bottom of your deck in any order: Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +1000 power until the end of your opponent's next turn.
